title: Scaffolders - Work in Australia
description:
KAEFER Integrated Services Pty Ltd 
is the Australian subsidiary of the KAEFER Group, a company renowned worldwide for excellence in the fields of asset integrity solutions and industrial services, with an annual turnover of around €1.7 billion and around 30,000 employees worldwide.
  
We specialise in the supply of asset integrity and industrial services solutions to the Oil, LNG, Mining and Power Industries and pride ourselves on our effective delivery of quality products and our exceptional service to clientele. We are also committed to the continuous development and training of our personnel to maintain a safe and rewarding work environment.
  
To be considered for any of the above roles you will need to demonstrate following:
 
Minimum of 3-5 years’ experience as an Intermediate or Advanced Scaffolder
Current C Class Drivers Licence
OHS Construction Induction Card
Working at Heights (within 3 years validity)
Confined Space (within 3 years validity) 
Current Passport / Proof of Working Rights
High Risk Work Licence (Desirable)
Ability to pass Scaffolding VOC
You are required to sit a pre-employment medical, including drug and alcohol screen
KAEFER Integrated Services Pty Ltd 
is an equal opportunity employer and strongly encourages Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander peoples to apply.
